name: core-range
description: The `core-range` element is used for managing a numeric value within a given range. It has no visual appearance and is typically used in conjunction with another element. One can build a progress bar using `core-range` like this:

value.name: value
value.description: The number that represents the current value.

min.name: min
min.description: The number that indicates the minimum value of the range.

max.name: max
max.description: The number that indicates the maximum value of the range.

step.name: step
step.description: Specifies the value granularity of the range's value.

ratio.name: ratio
ratio.description: Returns the ratio of the value.
